page.title: 13EASSIE WILDLIFE - BIRDS
page.content: In Eassie we have all the common birds such as robins, sparrows,chaffinches, blackbirds etc., but we also have others such as lapwings, curlews and oyster-catchers.This spring we had a family of oyster-catchers that came into our playground. Gamebirds in our area include pheasant, partridge and grouse. Occasionally a heron will fly overhead and land near the school. We have also seen spotted woodpeckers, tree creepers, barn owls and buzzards. Sometimes we see swans, geese, mallards,kestrels and sparrow hawks.
